publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-08-25T16:20-0400

change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: This collection contains material relating to the American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) and other theatrical unions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains material relating to the American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA) and other theatrical unions.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Martha Greenhouse sent a gift of her papers relating to the American Federation of Television and Radio Artists in 2002. The accession number associated with this gift is 2002.038.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Martha Greenhouse are held by Martha Greenhouse. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which s/he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Martha Greenhouse.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Martha Greenhouse Papers; WAG 217; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
